My Site

This is my third iteration of a personal site, after abandoning my last attempt 2 years ago. I am not passionate about front-end development, I have written more machine learning, systems, and compiler code in recent times.

So why bring it back now?

Value of a Personal Site

Developers make personal sites for several reasons. Among web developers, it is often a way to showcase some unique web skills, in a version of their resume that demonstrates ability.
